channel.title: Please Rethink the King
channel.description:
Last time they neutered King's check abilities it turned games into horrible snoozefests. This time is no different and I've lost all interest in the game. The game NEEDS a central information/investigative role like the one the old King had. It gave games a sense of direction that is sorely missing right now. Playing as something like Butler/Phys is even more boring than before since there's even less ways to gather information indirectly.
Old King actually felt like a KING and it was fun getting control of the court. You actually had POWER and therefore people were dependent on you for information to some degree. Nobody really gives a shit about the new king.
I'm really disappointed that the devs would try this failed implementation again and I wish they would STOP messing with things that are already working and listening to players who get butthurt when they get lynched as a neut because of a King check. At this point I'm just praying more perfectly fine mechanics/classes don't get dumpstered.
Just my 2 cents. Will probably not view replies.

item.title: Please Rethink the King
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Hey

Some of the most skilled Titanfall players I ever faced used that thing

Sure, they aren’t required to aim - except for using their secondary at range (usually the Wingman), which happens decently often, and the half of the game they spend in their titan.

Otherwise, it’s just a way to move your focus from aiming to positioning. Getting close enough to to lock on is a skillset of its own that gets very hard when facing skilled players. Mastering Titanfall’s movement system is way harder then mastering the ability to aim, to be quite honest.
